body.name: Huuger 47 inch Computer Desk with 4 Drawers, Gaming Desk with LED Lights & Power Outlets, Home Office Desk with Large Storage Space for Bedroom, Work from Home, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 18 hrs 40 mins
features: Huuger【Computer Desk with Drawers】- PATENT PENDING! Using an RF remote control to turn off the lights, the desk can be used as a home office desk for working from home. 4 fabric drawers help store files, stationery and other office supplies, this desk has ample storage space for you to store unlimited office supplies and documents. Super practical design!

【Gaming Desk with LED Lights】- This desk features built-in LED lighting with 20 colors, 22 modes, 5 adjustable brightness levels, and 10 flicker frequencies to create strong gaming ambiance that enhances your room.

【Desk with Power Outlets】- Equipped with 4 Standard Plug Outlets & 2 USB Ports, this computer desk with shelves can easily charge your phones, gaming gear and other office devices, avoiding cluttered wires.
【Computer Desk with Shelves】- The monitor stand allows you to sit correctly while working, you can have a healthy cervical spine to stay productive while working at home.

【Multiple Use】Available in black and rustic brown, this black desk with drawers can be used as writing desk, study desk but also gaming desk. The adjustable feet under the desk not only help protect your floor from scratches, but also ensure stability even on uneven ground.

【Easy to Assemble】- Desk dimension: 19.7"(D) x 47.3"(W) x 29.5"(H). All parts were clearly labelled, this desk is easy to put together, it will take less time if you have a home drill. Made from P2 Particle Board and powder coated steel, this black desk is very strong to be used for a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for Money
reviews.reviewText: I had $150 in Amazon gift cards, so took a shot in the dark with this desk. The reviews were fine but you never know. I am VERY impressed. The assembly was fine, but not the simplest (the instructions were a little obscure sometimes). I am 6ft 2 and I always have a problem with desk height especially with my rudder pedals. I can finally put my chair up to its proper height and not hit my knees. There isn't much lateral movement, however. But that isn't something I neededThe width is great for all of my toys. The multi-level and the led strip add a bonus.The drawers were shockingly deep, (enough to fit a laptop) which I didn't expect but was a welcome surprise. I have only had it a few days but I really like the sturdiness and quality. I highly recommend this desk.Make sure you know your drawer layout before putting them in as you won't get many opportunities to switch around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive, lots of excellent features especially for the price
reviews.reviewText: Goes together well, solid design. The cloth drawers with reinforcing bottoms are heavier duty than I thought they would be; totally satisfied with them. This was the best design for me with the shelving, multiple layers, 4 drawers, 2 open shelves on the bottom left and right, built in multi outlet power strip with 2 USB charging ports. I first bought the 55 inch long model, it arrived damaged. After sending it back, I looked at numerous other computer desks. I just couldn't find anything even at twice the price, which ticked all of the boxes for what I wanted. And the 47 inch length is sufficient for me. This one suits my needs perfectly for a computer desk in a bedroom that looks stylish, not too big, not too small, and the one included feature I didn't need was the stick on LED light strip. I guess for some people that would be a cool feature. I didn't need it, gave the light strip away. One thing I didn't like about the entire desk was the LED light strip; in addition to being able to select from different colors, all green, all blue, all red, all white, you can adjust the dimmer control. This feature (dimming) did not work well at all. Each press of the button the included remote for the LED light strip, would incrementally lower the brightness. But after 1 step of brightness reduction (there were about 4 steps total) the LEDs had a flicker to them which I do not like. At full strength I didn't notice a flicker but when the brightness was dimmed 2 times out of say 4, or more than 2, it would definitely flicker. No problem for me, I didn't want the LED light strip anyway.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pros: Looks really nice when assembled. LED lights gives it extra appeal with the different colors. I like that it's made of sturdy materials but not too heavy to move around. It's perfect for personal use or if you don't work with a lot of files/paper.Cons: The screw holes are misplaced so you have to force it. The screws are really cheap so you only get one chance to screw in. Which leads to the next issue. The instructions are incorrect when it comes to the parts for the drawers. The instructions were not clear and I didn't realize it until it was too late. I am not able to unscrew the drawer slot to correct it because the screw is now warped. I suggest leaving the screws a bit loose for the drawer slots until you know for sure they're in the right spots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This desk is more than expected.
reviews.reviewText: The desk was actually easy to assemble. Some complained of the instructions not being correct but you have to understand that when it references front it doesn't mean the front of desk it is telling you which side of the desk should face you as you are assembling for that instruction. the desk is sturdy and has a really good quality look to it. I did have an issue with handles missing and the lights not working but the company sent replacement handles and a remote. Problem solved and lights work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for my 11 yr old son's room. It as easy to assemble and even came with an actual screwdriver. It has fabric drawers that feel a bit more sturdy than most, thanks to handles. My son loves the built in charging station and lights! This desk is sturdy, a great size and perfect for what we were looking for. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice desk
reviews.reviewText: This desk is awesome and it’s reasonably priced, the lights are a nice touch and it is sturdy. It took me about a hour to build it but I was sleep deprived when building it so it can definitely be done faster. They even throw in a nice screwdriver with a magnetic tip in there to build it. I’ve had it about 3 days and have nothing bad to say.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing amazing desk
reviews.reviewText: This desk took me two hours to put together, and it is one of the best purchases I have made for my home office. The LED light is so cool, it’s pretty easy to put together, there’s a lot of storage space, and the wood is made out of a material that is really great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stand behind their product
reviews.reviewText: I bought this desk for my daughter for Christmas, and when they were putting it together, one of the legs broke, My son-in-law called up Amazon and they picked it up the next day and shipped out another one and my daughter absolutely loves her desk. She loves the lighting the different colors. She says it to a wonderful desk.
